Text: Re ISDA Master Agreements Cc with the Physical side of the business MGMCC they do not have any Master Agreements in place I think there may be a few agreements on the Financial side but our understanding was that these were oneoff agreements for longterm structured deals Am trying to follow up with MG and will revert with any findings Regards Lara Edmund Cooper AM To Tana CT cc Paul CT Mark CT Justin CT Amita CT Lara CT Subject Re ISDA Master Agreements Tana To date we do not know how many if any financial masters MG has in place Well check it out at this end and let you know when we have further details Thanks Edmund From Tana Jones on PM CDT To Paul CT Edmund CT cc Mark CT Subject ISDA Master Agreements Do we have a list and copies of any financial master agreements MG has in place When can we receive copies

Re ISDA Master Agreements Cc Evidently there are a few Masters on the Financial side MG Ltd The best person for you to speak to is Kevin Rhodes I have told him who you are so he wont be surprised if you emailcall him Kevin Rhodes also Hamish Scutt at Kevin should be able to get all the information you need Regards Lara Forwarded by Lara FieldsHOUECT on PM Edmund Cooper AM To Tana CT cc Paul CT Mark CT Justin CT Amita CT Lara CT Subject Re ISDA Master Agreements Tana To date we do not know how many if any financial masters MG has in place Well check it out at this end and let you know when we have further details Thanks Edmund From Tana Jones on PM CDT To Paul CT Edmund CT cc Mark CT Subject ISDA Master Agreements Do we have a list and copies of any financial master agreements MG has in place When can we receive copies

Re PA Review Bank of Nova Scotia Cc Can you please tell me if we must continue to refuse access to EnronOnline for The Bank of Nova Scotia They have sent in another Password Application to apply today If we must continue to refuse them can you please tell me what message I should convey to them Thank you Lara Enron Capital Trade Resources Canada Corp From Peter Keohane To Justin CT cc Lara CT Rob CT William S CT Mark CT Subject Re PA Review Bank of Nova Scotia Justin Enron Canada is currently in an unresolved dispute with Bank of Nova Scotia where from our perspective Bank of Nova Scotia has essentially been telling us to shove off The dispute involves BNSs purported requirement to consent to collateral security given to Enron Canada for physical and financial trading positions with a counterparty known as Beau Canada Neither Bank of Nova Scotia nor any affiliate of Bank of Nova Scotia should be traded OnLine and all trading ought to be monitored until such time as this matter is resolved and this should be expressly communicated to Bank of Nova Scotia They can speak to me directly at or to our President and CEO Rob Milnthorp at I am copying this memo to Bill Bradford and Mark Taylor for their information Justin Boyd AM To Lara CT cc Peter CT Subject Re PA Review Bank of Nova Scotia Lara Subject to approval from Peter the CP is a Canadian corporate I approve for all products except for US power weather and credit Peter thanks Justin To Edmund CT Justin CT Debbie CT Gail CT Enron London EOL Product Control CT Enron Europe Global CounterParty Annette CT ECT London Credit Enron Europe Global Contracts and Facilities EOL Marketing CT cc Subject PA Review Bank of Nova Scotia Hello all The Bank of Nova Scotia would like to trade with us online They are in GCP as and are existing customers of Enron Metals Jimmy Gordon is the one who got them to send in the PA if that helps Could you please let us know your comments in the S access Database thank you Lara Forwarded by Lara FieldsLONECT on London Fax System To Enron London EOL Product Control CT cc Subject New fax received Likely sender You have received a new fax from The image contains pages

Faxed Reg Forms and PAs Cc I just wanted to confirm that it is ok by US law to usefile Registration and Password Applications that have been received by fax and that the original signed copies are not required for EnronOnline Thanks Lara Product Control Group Meagan Brinkworth To Enron London EOL Product Control CT cc Subject Faxed Reg Forms and PAs Justin Boyd replied to my query as to whether it is acceptable to receive faxed registration forms and password applications According to European law faxed copies of these forms are allowed It is to Justins knowledge that Mark Taylor in the Houston legal department approved this process Meagan
